body_html:
Yes, that's exactly this :)

(Your code doesn't run on my version of pytorch because he ask for Variable instead of tensors. The following lines

import torch
import torch.nn as nn
from torch.autograd import Variable
input_size = 3
hidden_size = 4
model = nn.GRUCell(input_size, hidden_size, False).cuda()
x = Variable(torch.randn(5, input_size).cuda())
h = Variable(torch.randn(2, hidden_size).cuda())
model(x, h)

produce the free(): invalid pointer: 0x00007f78cc574d40 error.)

Looking at your output it seams fixed :)

body:
Yes, that's exactly this :)

(Your code doesn't run on my version of pytorch because he ask for Variable instead of tensors. The following lines
```
import torch
import torch.nn as nn
from torch.autograd import Variable
input_size = 3
hidden_size = 4
model = nn.GRUCell(input_size, hidden_size, False).cuda()
x = Variable(torch.randn(5, input_size).cuda())
h = Variable(torch.randn(2, hidden_size).cuda())
model(x, h)
```
produce the `free(): invalid pointer: 0x00007f78cc574d40` error.)

Looking at your output it seams fixed :)
